description.ruby-sapphire:
Sharp pins are fired to
strike 2 to 5 times.
description.emerald:
Sharp pins are fired to
strike 2 to 5 times.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Sharp pins are shot
at the foe and hit
two to five times
at once.

at the foe in rapid
succession.
They hit two to five
times in a row.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
